pages.text: The $(thing)Numismatic Dynamo$() generates energy from coins or $(item)Emeralds$().

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Raw materials required: 3 $(item)Gold Ingots$(), 4 $(item)Silver Ingots$(), 2 $(item)Iron Ingots$() and 3 $(item)Redstone$().

pages.title: Fuels
pages.text: The following items are accepted as fuel by the $(thing)Numismatic Dynamo$():$(li)$(item)Emerald$(): 200 000 RF$(li)$(item)Iron Coin$(): 30 000 RF$(li)$(item)Gold Coin$(): 40 000 RF$(li)$(item)Copper Coin$(): 30 000 RF$(li)$(item)Tin Coin$(): 30 000 RF$(li)$(item)Silver Coin$(): 40 000 RF$(li)$(item)Lead Coin$(): 40 000 RF$(li)$(item)Aluminum Coin$(): 40 000 RF$(li)$(item)Nickel Coin$(): 60 000 RF$(li)$(item)Platinum Coin$(): 80 000 RF$(li)$(item)Iridium Coin$(): 100 000 RF$(li)$(item)Mana Infused Coin$(): 150000RF

$(li)$(item)Steel Coin$(): 40 000 RF$(li)$(item)Electrum Coin$(): 40 000 RF$(li)$(item)Invar Coin$(): 40 000 RF$(li)$(item)Bronze Coin$(): 30 000 RF$(li)$(item)Constantan Coin$(): 45 000 RF$(li)$(item)Signalum Coin$(): 100 000 RF$(li)$(item)Lumium Coin$(): 100 000 RF$(li)$(item)Enderium Coin$(): 150 000 RF

The speed at which energy is generated and fuel is consumed depends on how much power can be emitted, and on the dynamo's maximum power output. A basic $(thing)Reactant Dynamo$() has a maximum power output of 40 RF/t. This can be increased by upgrading the dynamo to a higher tier, and by installing certain augments.

When an active $(thing)Reactant Dynamo$() cannot emit the energy it generates, it will keep working at its minimum power output (a tenth of its maximum power output). Any more energy that is generated in this case is lost. This can be resolved by installing an $(item)Excitation Field Limiter$().

pages.title: Tiers
pages.text: $(thing)Reactant Dynamos$() come in six tiers. These have the following power output limits and augment slots:$(li)Basic: 40 RF/t, no augments$(li)Hardened: 60 RF/t, 1 slot$(li)Reinforced: 80 RF/t, 2 slots$(li)Signalum: 100 RF/t, 3 slots$(li)Resonant: 120 RF/t, 4 slots

pages.title: Augments
pages.text: The following augments can be installed in a $(thing)Reactant Dynamo$() to improve it:$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/auxiliary_transmission_coil)Auxiliary Transmission Coil$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/fuel_catalyzer)Fuel Catalyzer$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/transmission_coil_ducting)Transmission Coil Ducting$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/excitation_field_limiter)Excitation Field Limiter$()$(li)$(l:mods_thermalexpansion/lapidary_calibration)Lapidary Calibration$()$(p)Note that the number of augments is limited by the dynamo's tier.
